author: timneutkens
message:
Webpack Build: Use name-contenthash instead of name-chunkhash for dynamic imports (#80153)

Did a bit of digging into #78756. This is a test to see if anything breaks when changing the option given that it seems we already read the file paths correctly, just needed to check it later in asset processing hook.

files.patch:
@@ -1281,7 +1281,7 @@ export default async function getBaseWebpackConfig(
           ? `[name].js`
           : `../[name].js`
         : `static/chunks/${isDevFallback ? 'fallback/' : ''}[name]${
-            dev ? '' : appDir ? '-[chunkhash]' : '-[contenthash]'
+            dev ? '' : '-[contenthash]'
           }.js`,
       library: isClient || isEdgeServer ? '_N_E' : undefined,
       libraryTarget: isClient || isEdgeServer ? 'assign' : 'commonjs2',
